9aaa4fb3-1011-4831-810b-6fd4cb9e9802.name: 战斗反射
9aaa4fb3-1011-4831-810b-6fd4cb9e9802.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

37ac6611-f0a5-4939-bf70-db4640b9e5f7.name: 硬皮
37ac6611-f0a5-4939-bf70-db4640b9e5f7.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

6b99d638-f010-47c9-9967-b5df512f7dc7.name: 高痛阈
6b99d638-f010-47c9-9967-b5df512f7dc7.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

cc1965a3-2b20-4bd1-9df4-f608a36df165.name: Another 30 points chosen from
cc1965a3-2b20-4bd1-9df4-f608a36df165.notes: Or from previous traits. Or spend points to start with additional gear

a065d2b1-e6ac-45b0-89ef-b2464127f71e.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

2d0ed8ac-4b31-4562-b2a4-a9ceb50a6d57.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

67b1aa07-4715-4c49-8bc2-d04133947698.name: 健康
67b1aa07-4715-4c49-8bc2-d04133947698.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

a760919b-2347-4f55-8098-cecdc912735a.name: Fit, Very
a760919b-2347-4f55-8098-cecdc912735a.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

c78be154-2cb2-4132-ab7f-af076e405f01.name: Hand Cannon
c78be154-2cb2-4132-ab7f-af076e405f01.notes: ST is treated as one level higher for the sole purpose of meeting the ST requirements of firearms. Up to 2.

7fa05347-9c3c-4f3f-bd62-522069e1a027.name: 幸运
7fa05347-9c3c-4f3f-bd62-522069e1a027.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

be25cc3b-125d-4da7-b06c-53cf8b6200e8.name: Luck, Extraordinary
be25cc3b-125d-4da7-b06c-53cf8b6200e8.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

932ed4b2-2488-4596-9984-f7c7218300f8.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
932ed4b2-2488-4596-9984-f7c7218300f8.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

3949931d-a30d-42e3-aab7-76047b9dc043.name: @谁：点数为 PC 起始点数的 150% 的个人@

a5219e24-37d0-464e-9b0a-e40cdd34f66e.name: @谁：拥有价值 1000 倍这个世界的起始财产的资产的组织@

572e14bc-a131-4cca-ab1c-4e2826cf5965.name: @谁：国家政府或是巨型跨国组织@

79585bf0-dad1-4bf8-9789-c4f484e981e2.name: Equipment
79585bf0-dad1-4bf8-9789-c4f484e981e2.notes: @装备的价值不会超过起始财富@

538ef129-0356-4a33-8ba0-b0842da82964.name: Equipment
538ef129-0356-4a33-8ba0-b0842da82964.notes: @装备的价值能够超过起始财富@

bacca0d0-f4e7-4fe0-9299-66de11edb70e.name: 特殊能力
bacca0d0-f4e7-4fe0-9299-66de11edb70e.notes: @在非魔法世界有魔法力量、拥有来自未来 TL 的装备、给予你特殊能力@

d5d0ab53-9c2b-437f-841c-9f6dd5e33fc0.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

96e1e774-915c-458e-ab42-af0fc811da12.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

f11c421b-8273-4768-93e2-eb23d897e9df.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

5fd68299-4b2e-459e-bb84-d9a244c17305.name: 标志性装备
5fd68299-4b2e-459e-bb84-d9a244c17305.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

c140d408-edd4-400d-8686-2fef5c316a20.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

37416212-76d7-460d-8032-afe60d7b7438.name: 和平主义：不能伤害无辜

4718fa99-12f7-4bc7-b5ae-f0c7e205c796.name: 期待陪伴
4718fa99-12f7-4bc7-b5ae-f0c7e205c796.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

8c9ccf68-409e-4e18-b57f-c6d13a841662.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
8c9ccf68-409e-4e18-b57f-c6d13a841662.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

af6ca092-1199-4325-8314-39e83abfff22.name: Experienced
af6ca092-1199-4325-8314-39e83abfff22.notes: Spend another 10 points on advantages. Exception: If you are normal-sized (below), the ST here costs 20 points, so don’t add the 2-point skill.

45e46ec1-f572-47e9-941c-7bb4775a3e54.name: Normal Sized
45e46ec1-f572-47e9-941c-7bb4775a3e54.notes: Remove Gigantism. Change ST to ST15 [50], Basic Move to 6, and SM to 0. Spend 5 fewer points on advantages, removing the size limitation from all options.

79c17f8e-f52e-4edf-9f20-4568baf75aad.name: Judo
79c17f8e-f52e-4edf-9f20-4568baf75aad.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。

7b419379-88f9-43d2-aeee-1743cf3fb06c.name: Spend 8 points for either +1 to both unarmed skills or +2 to one of them

7185b4bd-731b-48a5-a9e5-941131d33fc1.name: Or spend 4 points to either add another weapon skill from the previous list or give +1 to existing skill

d26ba383-dacc-45f9-a592-9ff13c87216c.name: Or spend 2 points for +1 to any secondary skill

cc2bbcdc-003f-4960-87f6-a8e796df4758.name: Or spend 1 point on any unchosen primary or secondary skill

c10ffe17-aa8a-49cd-abda-1dbe60af97be.name: Spend 2 points on another secondary skill
c10ffe17-aa8a-49cd-abda-1dbe60af97be.notes: Exception: If you are normal-sized (below), the ST here costs 20 points, so don’t add the 2-point skill.
